item.title: CondMatter II
item.description: Condensed Matter Physics II (E) - CondMatter II Course Condensed Matter Physics II (E) Course No. CondMatter II Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture English 3 4 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Basic knowledge in condensed matter physics and quantum mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral examination Length of Course: 2 semesters Aims of the Course: Advanced topics in condensed matter physics with examples of current research.
